item.description: Force Hugo to open external links with target _blank. Solution ðŸ‘‰ Hugo - Open External Links in a New Tab | Justin James

item.title: Python - Basic - print variables inline of a string
item.description: I’m new to python and asked me how to print variables in a string without concatination. Here it is: # first we need data karl = { 'who': 'karl', 'days': { 29: 4, 28: 4, 27: 6, 26: 4, 25: 4 } } print(f"{karl['who']}: {karl['days'][26]}") Output: karl: 4 The var-name between the curly braces will be printed. varData = "world" print(f"Hello {varData}") Output: Hello world

item.title: Githubpages doesn't like underscores
item.description: Underscores in filenames or directorynames result in a 404 not found. Solution add a empty file named .nojekyll to the root-directory Found the hint here -> Learning that Github Pages Struggles with Certain File Names

item.title: gc - another shell alias
item.description: Wouldn’t it be nice to have a alias for cloning a git repo and change to cloned directory? Here it is: # clones git and change to new dir alias gc='_gc(){ git clone $1 && cd `echo "$1" \ | sed -E "s|.*/([a-zA-Z0-9\\-]+)\.git|\1|"`; }; _gc' Usage: $ gc <CLONE-URL>
